entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then clearing. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 8:16 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023
